Source: logger/Logger.js

var showLogs = false; 

/**
 * Simple logger class with static method for different log levels
 */
class Logger {

	/**
	 * Call this method from root component to enable/disable logs
	 */
	static enableLogs(enableLogs) {
		showLogs = enableLogs;
	}

	/**
	 * If logs are enabled, logs a debug message
	 */
	static debug(message) {
		showLogs && console.debug(message);
	}

	/**
	 * If logs are enabled, logs a message
	 */
	static log(message) {
		showLogs && console.log(message);
	}

	/**
	 * If logs are enabled, logs a debug message
	 */
	static info(message) {
		showLogs && console.info(message);
	}

	/**
	 * If logs are enabled, logs a warn message
	 */
	static warn(message) {
		showLogs && console.warn(message);
	}

	/**
	 * If logs are enabled, logs an error message
	 */
	static error(message) {
		showLogs && console.error(message);
	}
}

export default Logger;
